title: Patch Notes
content: the hotbar that indicates a condition on your weapon is now also visible on the Character Sheet. The Objective UI widget telling you to reach the Netherbrain will now be cleared if you reach the stem while in stealth mode. Quietly singing the Mission Impossible theme tune while you do so remains optional. Updated the text size for books and single-page documents.
